I installed the sims3pack through the Sims 3 launcher installer, and the game is telling me I need to purchase them to use them?

How do we get these to appear in-game?  Using the Sims 3 loader installer doesn't work.  It says the installs were a success, but they don't actually appear in-game.  I used the sims3packs, so does the installer detect that they're not legit?  If so, is there a workaround to installing the sims3packs, and would using .package files create the same problem?

If I wanted to literally purchase the items, I would just purchase and download them from the store.  Is this torrent for people who have actually purchased them, or?

UPDATE: I just read that decrapified files don't work!  EA updated the launcher to reject decrapified files, and double-clicking them just runs the launcher.  So to the OP: how the heck do you expect people to install these if they DON'T WORK?
